entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain or snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
